mapper.insert: insert into tbl_auction_board (id, board_real_id, board_real_name, bs_id, station_real_code, cutting_sign, enable, remarks, create_person,create_time,del_flag) values (#{id}, #{boardRealId}, #{boardRealName}, #{bsId}, #{stationRealCode}, #{cuttingSign}, #{enable}, #{remarks}, #{createPerson}, #{createTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update tbl_auction_board
board_real_id = #{boardRealId},
board_real_name = #{boardRealName},
bs_id = #{bsId},
station_real_code = #{stationRealCode},
cutting_sign = #{cuttingSign},
enable = #{enable},
remarks = #{remarks},
modify_person = #{modifyPerson},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
where id = #{id}
